import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useMutation } from '@apollo/client' import { EDIT_AUTHOR } from '../queries' import { ALL_AUTHORS } from '../queries' const Authors = ( { show, authors } ) => { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [born, setBorn] = useState('') const [ editAuthor ] = useMutation(EDIT_AUTHOR, { refetchQueries: [ { query: ALL_AUTHORS } ] }) const submit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log('frontin authorit', authors) editAuthor({ variables: { name, born } }) setName('') setBorn('') } if (!show) { return null } return (

authors

{authors.allAuthors.map(a => )}
born books
{a.name} {a.born} {a.bookCount}

Set birthyear

Born setBorn(parseInt(target.value))} />
) } export default Authors
